structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Risk or safety assessment upon request of front-line staff -- Accompaniment by local law enforcement officer.
law.text: Front-line staff may request a risk or safety assessment prior to an investigation or delivery of services in a community setting. The direct supervisor of the requesting front-line staff and the safety liaison officer if a safety liaison officer position is designated for the county shall conduct the safety or risk assessment. If the situation warrants the accompaniment of front-line staff by a local law enforcement officer, the supervisor shall make the request to the local law enforcement agency.
law.history: Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 6, effective April 5, 2007.
